message: I propose we split the money 70/30. It's a generous offer considering the inflation working against you.
I propose a more balanced split of 60/40.  While the inflation is working against me,  I believe this is a fairer offer than your initial proposal.
Bob, let's be realistic. This is the last round where accepting my offer makes you more money than rejecting it and getting 0 next round.  I'm offering 65/35.
